org.baswell.httproxy

Class SimpleProxyDirector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.baswell.httproxy.SimpleProxyDirector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProxyDirector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleIODirector, SimpleNIOProxyDirector

    public abstract class SimpleProxyDirector
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProxyDirector
    A simple ProxyDirector that proxies to a single server and prints out proxy events.

      • siftRequestHeader

        public java.lang.String siftRequestHeader(java.lang.String headerName,
                                 java.lang.String headerValue,
                                 ProxiedRequest request)
        Description copied from interface: ProxyDirector
        Called for each header processed in a request. If a different value for this header needs to be sent to the server return a non-null value. If null is returned the header will be sent to the server unaltered.
        Specified by:
        siftRequestHeader in interface ProxyDirector
        Parameters:
        headerName - The name of the request header.
        headerValue - The value of the request header.
        request - The proxied request.
        Returns:
        A non-null header value to alter what is sent to the server or null to send the header unaltered.

      • addRequestHeaders

        Specified by:
        addRequestHeaders in interface ProxyDirector
        Parameters:
        request - The proxied request.
        Returns:
        A list of additional of headers to send to the server or null to not add any headers.

      • siftResponseHeader

        public java.lang.String siftResponseHeader(java.lang.String headerName,
                                  java.lang.String headerValue,
                                  ProxiedRequest request,
                                  ProxiedResponse response)
        Description copied from interface: ProxyDirector
        Called for each header processed in a response. If a different value for this header needs to be sent to the client return a non-null value. If null is returned the header will be sent to the client unaltered.
        Specified by:
        siftResponseHeader in interface ProxyDirector
        Parameters:
        headerName - The name of the request header.
        headerValue - The value of the request header.
        request - The proxied request.
        response - The proxied response.
        Returns:
        A non-null header value to alter what is sent to the server or null to send the header unaltered.
